homePage.title: Discover North Lebanon
homePage.titleDesc: Each city has its own stuff, and get to know them more with us
homePage.subHeader1: Enjoy a variety of activities throughout the North!
homePage.subHeader2: Each city has its own stuff, and get to know them more with us
homePage.subHeader3: First time in the north? Don't worry you can have a tour guide

aboutUsPage.headerDesc: We are 5 people of north Lebanon youth. Our main goal is it showcase this part of our country and make it accessible for all visitors. So, we located all the interesting activities along with a handful of tour guides in order to make discovering the north of Lebanon a delightful journey.

header2.subText1: As part of Lebanon youth community we wanted to walk you through one of the best places in Lebanon, The North. Explore the cities, activities and Enjoy our North!
header2.subText2: Being patriotic people, we like to work for the progress and glory of our country and we're trying to make it powerful and rich. It is our duty and we're aiming to do it in the best possible way.
header2.subText3: The almost complete suspension of international travel has been one of the major elements of the quarantines introduced during the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) pandemic. Our goal is to attract tourists to visit Lebanon once the disease ends.

aboutUsPage.footerDesc: After visiting our site, you may have some advises. We would like to hear them from you.
